title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon: Inside the Counter-Terror Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terrorist targets in Lebanon: A building where warfare means were stored and a military structure.

A short while ago, air force fighter jets attacked a military structure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Hanin area in southern Lebanon.

Throughout the day, IDF forces attacked a building where warfare means were stored, along with other terrorist targets in the Jabal Chamis and ‘Ita al-Shaab areas in southern Lebanon.

Also, in the past few hours, a number of launches that crossed from Lebanese territory to the Mount Dov and Manara areas were identified. IDF forces attacked the launch sources.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the military building:
https://bit.ly/3IYLRim
